Keywords: S.H.I.E.L.D. , Spy
Real Name: Matt Murdock
Special Powers
RADAR SENSE: Stealth, Improved Targeting: Hindering.
LEVEL 10 S.H.I.E.L.D. AGENT: Daredevil, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. and friendly characters within 3 squares are considered adjacent to each other when using the S.H.I.E.L.D. team ability.
EVEN IN FRANCE I CAN'T GET AWAY FROM THE HAND: Running Shot, Charge, Flurry, Sidestep.

December 20, 2021
Buckwheat
Time is relative. Relative to the majority of Legacy Card dials, that push 10 years old, this one is recent. This is one of only a handful of dials that are from the New Card era. Check out the Legacy Cards from the other sets.
December 20, 2021
hoojeebo
Seeing as how there's a mini "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D." theme in this set (Dazzler, Kitty, Wolverine), it's fun that they decided to include an update for this guy as well. Very clever. I wouldn't exactly call June 2017 "recent" either.
December 18, 2021
Buckwheat
This was a bizarre choice for a Legacy Card. A recent dial, and not very popular.

Dang, I thought this dude was good for 60-pts, but not only do they knock off 10-pts and keep all the juicy goodness, but give him Charge + Flurry and IT:Hindering in addition! Definitely going to be on the hunt for this card. ;-)
